results.title: Co-administration of simvastatin and cytotoxic drugs is advantageous in myeloma cell lines.
results.text_hl: Co-administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Drug_Fever</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092582 @@@cytotoxic drugs@@@ is advantageous in @DISEASE_Multiple_Myeloma @DISEASE_MESH:D009101 @@@myeloma@@@ cell lines.

citations.NLM: Drucker L, Afensiev F, Radnay J, Shapira H, Lishner M. Co-administration of simvastatin and cytotoxic drugs is advantageous in myeloma cell lines. Anticancer Drugs. 2004 Jan;15(1):79-84. PMID: 15090747
citations.BibTeX: @article{15090747, title={Co-administration of simvastatin and cytotoxic drugs is advantageous in myeloma cell lines.}, author={Drucker L and Afensiev F and Radnay J and Shapira H and Lishner M}, journal={Anticancer Drugs}, volume={15}, number={1}, pages={79-84}}

results.title: Simvastatin Induced Neurite Outgrowth Unveils Role of Cell Surface Cholesterol and Acetyl CoA Carboxylase in SH-SY5Y Cells
results.text_hl: Statins are known to modulate cell surface @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ (CSC) and @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMP-activated protein kinase@@@ (@GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@) in non-neural cells; however no study demonstrates whether CSC and @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ may regulate @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ induced neuritogenesis (@<m>DISEASE_Drug_Fever</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092582 @@@SIN@@@).

citations.NLM: Raina V, Gupta S, Yadav S, Surolia A. Simvastatin Induced Neurite Outgrowth Unveils Role of Cell Surface Cholesterol and Acetyl CoA Carboxylase in SH-SY5Y Cells PLoS One. 2013;8(9):e74547. PMID: 24040277
citations.BibTeX: @article{24040277, title={Simvastatin Induced Neurite Outgrowth Unveils Role of Cell Surface Cholesterol and Acetyl CoA Carboxylase in SH-SY5Y Cells}, author={Raina V and Gupta S and Yadav S and Surolia A}, journal={PLoS One}, volume={8}, number={9}, pages={e74547}}
